titleStmt.title: Sample A24 from The Providence Journal, November 29, 1961

P.22"70 Taxpayers File" "Hurt in 2-Car Crash" "Home Ransacked" "City Can't Fix..." "Brown Buys House" "Employes Picket" "Crash Injures..." "Warwick School Issue" "Given $55,000" "Santa Claus Fund" "Youth Injures Heel" P. 23 "$4,177,37 Is Paid" "Italy Wil Give..." N."Back from Patrol" 1440-1510 O."FBI Arrests Jurar" 1520-1860 P."New President..." 1870-1980
